statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, location FROM InventoryLevels WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM InventoryLevels WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM InventoryLevels WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT location FROM InventoryLevels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM InventoryLevels WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE location LIKE '%Store%';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, last_updated FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT location_name, current_capacity, max_capacity FROM locations WHERE current_capacity < max_capacity;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, current_capacity FROM locations WHERE inventory_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;

SELECT inventory.product_name, locations.location_name, locations.current_capacity FROM inventory JOIN locations ON inventory.id = locations.inventory_id WHERE locations.current_capacity < locations.max_capacity;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR quantity > 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity_changed < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, p.product_name, t.quantity_changed FROM transactions t JOIN inventory p ON t.product_id = p.id;
SELECT s.supplier_name, s.address, t.transaction_type FROM suppliers s JOIN transactions t ON s.id = t.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity * price AS total_value FROM inventory WHERE quantity * price >= 100;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, quantity_change, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.item_id = transactions.item_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, location_name FROM employees JOIN locations ON employees.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE department = 'Sales' OR department = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity_change < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_name LIKE 'Warehouse%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_products WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM inventory_products JOIN products_inventory_categories ON inventory_products.product_id = products_inventory_categories.product_id JOIN products_categories ON products_inventory_categories.category_id = products_categories.category_id;
SELECT SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_quantity_changed, transaction_type FROM inventory_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY total_quantity_changed DESC;
